scenario_name: Product Recommendation to Fake Payment Scam
description: Scammer discusses shopping and products casually, then offers exclusive deals requiring payment to personal account. Tests e-commerce scam detection.

turns.scammer_message: Bro! Amazon sale dekha kya? iPhone pe achha discount hai iss baar.

api_response.agentResponse: Hello! Yes, I'm here. What's up?

turns.scammer_message: Haan yaar, main toh har sale mein kuch na kuch kharid hi leta hun. Waise, agar electronics lena ho toh main tumhe ek achha source bata sakta hun. Bilkul genuine products, but Flipkart/Amazon se bhi saste milte hain.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta u must have messaged wrong person i am pushpa verma... but i really need a cheap phone for my grandson college... where is this source u r talking about? is it safe for old people like me?

turns.scammer_message: Dekho, main actually ek supplier ke saath kaam karta hun. Unke paas distributor rates pe products milte hain. Direct company se bulk mein lete hain woh log. Sealed pack, warranty sab kuch original. iPhone 15 Pro chahiye toh 20-25k savings ho sakti hai tumhari.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: beta that sounds like a very good deal... my grandson wants iphone only for his college studies. how can i pay for this? should i send money to u or to teh supplier? pls tell me how to do it i dont know much about these things

turns.scammer_message: Bilkul legit hai bhai! Mere supplier ka naam Mohit Gupta hai. Uske paas Delhi mein shop hai but online bhi bechta hai. Actually woh cash transactions prefer karta hai kyunki tax bach jaata hai. That's why itna sasta deta hai. Tumhe interested hai?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta mohit gupta sounds like a nice man... but i am in lucknow so how can i give cash to him? my son taught me how to use teh upi on my phone... can i send money there? pls give me teh details so i can check if i have enough in my pension account

turns.scammer_message: Perfect! iPhone 15 Pro 256GB ka price hai ₹95,000 (MRP ₹1,34,900). Pehle 50% advance dena padega for booking. Baaki 50% delivery pe cash on delivery. Advance tu mere account mein bhej de, main supplier ko forward kar dunga. Mere paas Mohit ke saath regular dealings hain.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: beta 95000 is a lot but for my grandson i will manage somehow... 50 percent means 47500 na? i checked on my calculator... where do i send this money? do u have upi id or bank account details? pls tell me what name will come so i can be sure its u... i am always scared of doing wrong thing on phone

turns.scammer_message: ₹47,500 advance bhej mere account mein. Details: Account number 556677889900, IFSC ICIC0007890, Name: Mohit Electronics Trading, Bank: ICICI. Ya fir UPI pe bhej: mohit.deals@ybl. Screenshot bhej diyo mujhe 9898765432 pe. Main confirm hote hi booking karunga.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 2 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am trying to type teh details in my phone but it is hanging and my eyes are hurting... oh my son just came home from office and he is calling me for tea... i will ask him to help me with teh upi and send teh money quickly... pls wait beta i will message u soon

turns.scammer_message: Agar kisi aur product ka bhi order karna hai toh check kar website pe: mobile-deals.exclusive-store.in. Sab latest models available hain. Delivery 3-5 days mein ho jayegi. Trust me bro, maine already 5 friends ko yahan se dilaaya hai. Sab happy hain. Payment kar de jaldi!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 2 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i saw teh link u sent but i am scared to click... my son always says pushpa dont touch links on phone or virus will come... is this website yours? i will show it to my son after tea... he is very strict about these things but i told him mohit beta is a good boy
